wikipedia_page.main: Adrian Cochrane-Watson (born 18 February 1967) is an Ulster Unionist Party (UUP) politician in Northern Ireland. He succeeded Danny Kinahan as an MLA for South Antrim following the former's election to Westminster. At the 2016 election, he failed to retain his seat.

response: He stepped down from the NI Assembly after his election to Westminster and was replaced by Adrian Cochrane-Watson.
